import React from "react"; import Header from '../components/header' const Badminton = () => { return (<>

Badminton

Download

Overview

This is a simple Fitbit application that keeps track of the score of a badminton game. Features include indicating the serving player and side, handling deuces, and the 30-point maximum.

Questions, comments, concerns? Feel free to drop an email at ss.rodriguez1850@gmail.com.

Frequently Asked Questions

How do I start/continue a game?
The game is on standby when no side is highlighted blue. Tap on a side to set that side as the server (it will be highlighted), any subsequent taps will add one point to the tapped side.

How do I restart a game?
Hold down the red reset button until the scores are reset to 0. Tap to set a server and start playing.

How do change the serving player?
Hold down the side to serve until that side is highlighted.

Changelog

1.1.3

  • FEAT: Score is now saved between application loads and unloads.
  • FEAT: Settings option to toggle screen timeout (be mindful of screen burn-in).

1.1.2

  • FIX: Minor optimizations.

1.1.1

  • FIX: Minor bugfixes.

1.1.0

  • FIX: Minor bugfixes.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.
